code: import React from'react';import'./StatsDisplay.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatsDisplay=_ref=>{let{npcs,apiCallCount,rateLimitError}=_ref;const getGroupedStats=()=>{const houseStats={};const genderStats={};const locationStats={};npcs.forEach(npc=>{const house=npc.house.replace('House ','');houseStats[house]=(houseStats[house]||0)+1;genderStats[npc.gender]=(genderStats[npc.gender]||0)+1;const location=npc.location||'Unknown';locationStats[location]=(locationStats[location]||0)+1;});return{houseStats,genderStats,locationStats};};const{houseStats,genderStats,locationStats}=getGroupedStats();const getRateLimitClass=()=>{if(rateLimitError)return'rate-limit-error';if(apiCallCount>=7)return'rate-limit-warning';return'rate-limit-ok';};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-display",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Houses:"})," ",Object.entries(houseStats).map(_ref2=>{let[house,count]=_ref2;return`${house}(${count})`;}).join(', ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Gender:"})," ",Object.entries(genderStats).map(_ref3=>{let[gender,count]=_ref3;return`${gender}(${count})`;}).join(', ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Locations:"})," ",Object.entries(locationStats).map(_ref4=>{let[location,count]=_ref4;return`${location}(${count})`;}).join(', ')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-group rate-limit-status",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"API Usage:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:getRateLimitClass(),children:[apiCallCount,"/10 calls this minute"]}),rateLimitError&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rate-limit-message",children:" \u26A0\uFE0F Rate limit reached - using simulation mode"})]})]});};export default StatsDisplay;
